features: Box of 50 Kids Masks In Sanitary Dispenser Box: Includes 10 Masks each of 5 different bright colors (pInk, Aqua, blue, green, yellow) that kids will love! Our 3-layer sanitary Masks come In a sealed plastic shrInk-wrapped box that has a perforated dispenser top, so you can conveniently dispense one mask at a time.

3-Layers of Filtering Protection: Our 3-ply masks contain a premium pp non-woven outer filter layer, a premium melt-blown polypropylene filtration layer, and a premium soft absorbent pp non-woven inner filter layer. Soft elastic ear loops and flexible adjustable nose clip.

Easy Breathing, Comfortable to Wear: Child-sized (5.7” x 3.7”) form-fitting tri-folded masks that are perfect for smaller faces. Tri-folded masks that extend down to cover the face from the nose to underneath the chin with a snug secure fit. The masks are designed for general sanitary purposes only. They are non-medical and are not proven to reduce the transmission of diseases. Single-use masks.

Ideal Kids Wear: Used by kids at home, school, child care, playing indoor or outdoor, and other fun activities. Masks not intended to be used as toys and also not intended for use by children less than 4 years of age. Perfect for ages 4-12 with adult supervision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost 12 year old likes them
reviews.reviewText: My 11 year old will be 12 in a month and a half. He says they fit nice. He is a skinny boy. I tried them on and they have a good stretch. My son really likes these.The nose wire is a bit stiff. It does bend but it doesn't bend well enough to shape around the nose to eliminate glass fog.The color variety is nice. I can use the pink ones. The price is good too.These smell like the masks hospitals and clinics provide. There isn't a strong chemical smell.I'll definitely order these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and durable
reviews.reviewText: I have bought 3 boxes of these so far for my kiddos 3-9 yo . They have reusable ones but they are not as lightweight/ breathable as these are so I'd rather them wear these to school. I love them. We like the different colors and the metal inside to pinch at the nose. They are also lightweight and breathable. For my toddlers I do tie the ends because they are a little too big but not by much. Also don't let your kiddos just hurry and grab it out the box or it may rip a tie/loop .. this also should be an easy fix though if u just tie it back through the hole in the mask for it. I definitely will continue buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are cute colors . Well made . Pinches Delicately at nose so it doesn’t fall down.my daughter says rhey are comfy and breathable. She’s 5 and tiny but I would say a small 6-7 year old would fit this just fine .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get these for my children. They seem to fit their faces well, although we have to tie the strings to shorten them for my youngest.The colors are vibrant on one side which makes it easier for them to see which side faces out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small children
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for kids. I have a 10 year old daughter, 14 daughter and a 16 year old son. This fits my girls perfectly. My 14 and 10 yr Olds are very close in size. 10 YO is super tall for her age (5'1) and my 14 yr old is very small for her age. (4'11) I yell you that so you know how this ffits. It fits them very well but it seems to be a tad small for my 16 year old son. So they are great for smaller children. My girls love the different colors because they can "match" their outfits most of the time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kid's masks for a good price
reviews.reviewText: My kids liked that these came in a few different colors. The ear straps rarely snap off which is usually my biggest gripe with a disposable mask but it's only happened to maybe two out of this whole pack. I'd definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kids mask!
reviews.reviewText: The mask is perfect for my 6 year old. The loops around the ears are a little too big but I make small knots on each side for a comfortable fit. She doesn’t complain about them and I don’t mind doing it. I see a lot of complaints about it but it’s no big deal for me or my daughter. For the price and the fact that she uses a new one each day for school I’ll deal with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They fit my first and second graders perfectly.
